DOCNAME: CASE OF BLAGOJEVIĆ AND OTHERS v. SERBIA
CONCLUSION: Violation of Article 6 - Right to a fair trial (Article 6 - Disciplinary proceedings;Article 6-1 - Access to court);Violation of Article 1 of Protocol No. 1 - Protection of property (Article 1 para. 1 of Protocol No. 1 - Peaceful enjoyment of possessions)
JUDGES: Branko Lubarda;Georgios A. Serghides;Pere Pastor Vilanova
TEXT: CARDINAL . All applicants were former employees of “ GPE u stečaju ( the debtor ) , which was , at the relevant time , a company predominantly comprised of socially - owned capital .
CARDINAL . NORP Since the debtor failed to fulfil its contractual obligations towards its employees , on an unspecified date , the applicants instituted civil proceedings against it .
CARDINAL . On DATE ORG ordered the debtor to pay the applicants specified amounts on account of salary arrears , plus the costs and expenses of the civil proceedings .
CARDINAL . On DATE the above judgment became final .
CARDINAL . DATE and DATE all applicants filed separate requests for the enforcement of the above judgment .

CARDINAL . ORG ultimately accepted the applicants’ requests and issued the enforcement orders , respectively . The essential information as to the enforcement proceedings in respect of each application is outlined in the ORG to this judgment .
CARDINAL . On DATE ORG opened insolvency proceedings in respect of the debtor ( St. CARDINAL/CARDINAL ) .
CARDINAL . The applicants duly submitted their respective claims .
CARDINAL . On an unspecified date the ORG claims based on the judgment of DATE were formally recognised .
CARDINAL . The insolvency proceedings against the debtor are still ongoing .
CARDINAL . On DATE , the applicants lodged a constitutional appeal .

CARDINAL . On DATE ORG dismissed the appeal in respect of all applicants except the applicants PERSON ( application no . CARDINAL/CARDINAL ) , PERSON ( application no . CARDINAL/CARDINAL ) and PERSON PERSON ( application no . PERSON ) .

CARDINAL . On DATE ORG also found a violation of the right to a hearing within a reasonable time , in respect of Ms ORG , PERSON and PERSON . It further awarded each of them MONEY ( ORG ) as just satisfaction for non - pecuniary damage and ordered the court in Leskovac to expedite the proceedings .
